official_title: A joint resolution to provide for the designation of the week commencing on June 5, 1983, as "National Welfare Fraud Prevention Week".

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that the President should declare the week commencing June 5, 1983, as National Welfare Fraud Prevention Week.
